B

backup - Variable in class db.FileItem
 
backup_dir - Static variable in class dev.BackupdataResource
Configuration set by main to store the backup directory.
BackupCommand - Class in client
Implement the "backup" command in the client.
BackupCommand() - Constructor for class client.BackupCommand
 
BackupdataResource - Class in dev
The resource represents a backup data.
BackupdataResource(Context, Request, Response) - Constructor for class dev.BackupdataResource
Construct the resource.
BackupThread - Class in dev
The BackupThread periodically gathers all the File items for which number of Backup/Location is less than Backup/@count and tries to backup that file to one more online device.
BackupThread(Database, long) - Constructor for class dev.BackupThread
Construct a new thread object.
BaseResource - Class in api
Base class to support common functions among the resources, e.g., authentication and authenticated username.
BaseResource(Context, Request, Response) - Constructor for class api.BaseResource
Construct the object.
